p: Number of chicks that fledged each year generally followed the trends observed for adults ( Fig. 2). However, significant variation between 2003 and 2010 reflects a series of years with poor breeding success followed by better reproductive output in the following year. Numbers of new breeders showed a similar albeit weakened pattern delayed by 5 years: starting in 2004, numbers of new breeders seem to mimic those of fledglings beginning in 1999.
